data.name: Ziggurat 2 - Supporter Pack
data.detailed_description:
This pack for Ziggurat 2 includes 4 weapons unlocked right away.
  • New wand: Wand of the Covenant
  • New spell: Sacrificial Dagger
  • New staff: Staff of the Watcher
  • New alchemic weapon: Incarnation of Pain
data.about_the_game:
This pack for Ziggurat 2 includes 4 weapons unlocked right away.
  • New wand: Wand of the Covenant
  • New spell: Sacrificial Dagger
  • New staff: Staff of the Watcher
  • New alchemic weapon: Incarnation of Pain
data.short_description: This pack for Ziggurat 2 features a new set of weapons!
data.supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Italian, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Japanese, French, Czech

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64bits or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 1GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bits
  • Processor: i7 7700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 3GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+, tested on OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.5GHz dual-core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 Graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+, tested on OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: Quad core processor

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Tested on Ubuntu 20.04.1
  • Processor: Dual Core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 1GB or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: i7 7700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 3GB or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
